MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DD6 area of Newport-on-Tay. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a fault on our underground electricity network near the Maryknowe substation and due to the extent of the repairs required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 2pm via generator. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:33am on Sunday, 31 January 2021
